Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Major Tech Hub skill, you can easily control and manage your Major Tech Hub smart home devices using voice. Simply follow these easy steps to get started:
• Download the Major Tech Hub app from your app store and create an account.
• Set up your devices in the Major Tech Hub app and assign appropriate names for your devices.
• Download the Amazon Alexa app from the Google Play Store, Apple App Store, or Amazon Appstore, then configure your Alexa Echo device using the Alexa app.
• In the Alexa app, search for the Major Tech Hub skill under the "Skills & Games" section.
• Enable the Major Tech Hub skill, and you will be prompted to log in to your Major Tech Hub account.
• Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the linking process.
• Once linked, you can enjoy voice control of your Major Tech Hub devices. Try commands like:
 "Alexa, turn on the kitchen light."
 "Alexa, turn off the bedroom heater."
 "Alexa, turn on the pool pump."
 "Alexa, turn off the energy meter."
 "Alexa, set the living room light brightness to 30%."
 "Alexa, open the garage door."
From lighting to energy management and access control, the Major Tech Hub skill and smart devices provide an efficient and intuitive smart home experience. Enjoy the convenience of controlling your devices with simple voice commands.
